sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_nb_action.RASearchSourcesTableChoices</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>RASearchSourcesTableChoices</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var RASearchSourcesTableChoices = Class.create();
RASearchSourcesTableChoices.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	process: function(tableName) {
		var gr= new GlideRecord(Constants.TBL_SEARCH_FILTER);
	  gr.addQuery(Constants.COL_SEARCH_CONTEXT_CONFIG, current.context.search_application_configuration);
	  gr.query();
		answer=new Array();
		answer.push("");
		while(gr.next())
			answer.push(gr.ais_search_source.datasource.source+"");
		return answer;
	},

    type: 'RASearchSourcesTableChoices'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-08-28 09:56:13</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>ae8ce4b7c3303110852da6bec840dd55</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>RASearchSourcesTableChoices</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Recommended Actions" source="sn_nb_action">427fe83177221010d7159b71a91061e1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Recommended Actions">427fe83177221010d7159b71a91061e1</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ae8ce4b7c3303110852da6bec840dd55</sys_update_name>

        <sys_updated_on>2023-08-28 09:56:13</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
